title: U.S. Retail Sales Jump by Most Since March
itunes:title: U.S. Retail Sales Jump by Most Since March
description:
Dr. Iman Abuzeid, CEO at Incredible Health, discusses vaccine mandates for health care workers. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News P&I Reporter Peter Robison talk about Peter's Businessweek story Boeing Built an Unsafe Plane, Blamed the Pilots When It Crashed. Bloomberg Intelligence Senior U.S. Retail Analyst Poonam Goyal breaks down today’s retail sales data and earnings from retailers Home Depot and Walmart. Bloomberg News Consumer Reporter Amelia Pollard explains why inflation is set to spoil the holidays for struggling U.S. families. And We Drive to the Close with Larry Pitkowsky, Managing Partner at Goodhaven Capital Management.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
